text: Hey guys. Welcome to my chateau. Just chilling in my chateau

will stop there. Basically this is very famous. It was used for
lots of postcards, but most importantly it was the inspiration for

are starting to see it, now your starting to put 2 and 2 together

to it. So there you go, I hope you enjoyed that.
Example of what I was telling you guys about the beautification
process that is going on in Europe. I told you on the first day
about the scaffolding, look at that end of the cathedral

and that is what they are doing all big churches, buildings and

The other thing Bordeaux is famous for is its wine. It is a huge,
huge wine region, so that is what we are having. We are having
Bordeaux Superior. I don't know what, the different types of red
but it's good, it actually tastes really very good. Wine in
Bordeaux is a must, and now its done.
So wondering the streets here in Bordeaux, I discovered one
very important thing, that people like to eat a lot of food here,
everywhere, all the time. because it's like 11 o'clock at night on
a Wednesday, and every restaurant is open and there are
people eating everywhere. It's craziness, absolute craziness.

And we are just trying not to get
